doc.field: CARTER-DAY IN SETTLEMENT WITH POWER COMPANIES

Carter-Day INdustries Inc said it reached an eight mln dlrs settlement in a suit filed in the Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of N.Y. against five power companies. The suit was filed against Montana Power Co MTP>, Puget Sound Power and Light Co PSD>, Portland General Electric Co PGN>, Washington Water Power Co WWP> and PacifiCorp's PPW> Pacific Power and Light Co. Carter-Day said proceeds from the settlement will be used to restore the company's liquidity, working capital and net worth. Reuter
